Go wild for a while. #adventure
Sunday is a day of rest. #lazyfact
The goal of Sunday is to leave my home as little as possible.
A Sunday well spent brings a week of content.
Sunday, the day for the language of leisure.
You were given another opportunity to live Sunday cheerfully, use it and enjoy the day!
People can be great competitors on Sunday and mates on Monday.
Give and accept pleasure, happiness, and laughter, because today is Sunday!
Oh, dear Sunday, I want to sleep in your arms and have the fun day.
There is always something new to learn and feel each Sunday.
Time flows in a strange way on Sundays.
Let this Sunday be a rainbow for the entire upcoming week! Shine and smile!
Sunday clears away the rust of the whole week.
Sunday is the perfect day to refuel your soul and to be grateful for each and every one of your blessings.
Sunday is the golden clasp that binds together the volume of the week.
It’s a new day. I’m alive. I’m blessed. God is good. God is great. Have a blessed Sunday!
Sunday, for me, is all about being home with the family with no plans. Blessed Sunday!
Let go of all the worries and anxiety in order to be light and free. Have a Happy Sunday!
Sunday is your best day. You know you had an amazing week. Time to recover and think how you gonna kill the next one.
Now I know why the Lord took his day off on Sunday. That must be the day he personally greets his favorites.
Dance in the rhythm of life, enjoy all that this world has offered you. Happy Sunday!
SUNDAY. Take it slow and give your soul a chance to catch up with your body.
My to-do list for Sunday: – Count my blessings, – Let go of what I can’t control, – Listen to my heart, – Just breathe, Happy Sunday and go to the Beach.
Have the courage to start a new path this Sunday and a miracle will happen.
5 steps to a productive Sunday: Wake up early; Get some fresh air; Set a schedule; Make time for yourself; Be goal-oriented.
If Sunday is the Lord’s day, then Saturday belongs to the Devil. It is the only night of the week when he gives out Free passes to the Late show at the Too Much Fun Club.
Today is Sunday. Share this and within 7 days you’ll get another Sunday. It really works. My friend ignored this message and he got a Monday within 24 hours.
Live in the sunshine.
Take your life into your own hands and make this Sunday awesome!
Not always sunny but in a sunny state of mind.
I think it’s time to be happy again. #sundayfun
It’s Sunday here again. Let’s roll baby!
Saturdays are for adventures, Sundays are for cuddling.
My Sunday nightmare is thinking tomorrow is Monday.
You should wear glass cause my Sunday selfie could hurt you that so shine.
I spent a year in that town, on Sunday.
Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.
In the right light, at the right time, everything is extraordinary. #happyweekend
This is your Sunday evening reminder that you can handle whatever this week throws at you.
Sunday is my most favorite day to do selfies.
Live in the sunshine. Swim in the sea. Drink the wild air.
On Sunday morning, I’m not nervous… I can’t wait to tell what God wants me to say.
Well, there’s nothing better than putting your feet up on a Sunday afternoon and grabbing a good book.
I really need a day between Saturday and Sunday.
I’m completely obsessed with Sunday roast dinners. I think that it’s the best thing to ever happen in life!
Ah, Sunday… A day of rest… Rest of the laundry, rest of the house and rest of all the other stuff I put off on Saturday!
Sunday should feel like top knots, sweatpants and be preparing for next week your best ever.
Sunday checklist: do nothing and chill.
I go to church every Sunday, which is like going to the gas station once a week and really, really filling up.
It’s not a Sunday unless you completely waste it then feel really sad around 8 P.M.
I once spent a year in Philadelphia, I think it was on a Sunday.
This is Sunday, and the question arises, what’ll I start tomorrow?
It’s Sunday, therefore I am 100% motivated to do nothing today!
In the morning on Sunday, a drum is sounded at about 8 o’clock.
If God hadn’t rested on Sunday, He would have had time to finish the world.
There are many persons who look on Sunday as a sponge to wipe out the sins of the week.
Do not let Sunday be taken from you. If your soul has no Sunday, it becomes an orphan.
If your Sunday doesn’t involve wine & yoga pants you’re doing it wrong.
It was Sunday morning, and old people passed me like sad grey waves on their way to church.
SUNDAY: The day…I planned a lot but actually do nothing.
Between Monday and Saturday, men make an audience. On Sunday, they make a congregation.
